about_the_game:
Welcome to Misguidead!
Misguidead is a co-op focused horror game. Players must try to survive by cooperating as they drift through the mysteries of different religions. The mystery of a new religion is waiting to be discovered on each map in the game, which consists of different parts. Fear will never leave you in this world where you will enter with your friend or a random player. You will constantly gain new experiences in the game that you will have to rediscover every time you play. Cooperation is the only way to survive in this challenging and terrifying adventure.

The Secret of Survival Collaboration!
Nothing had ever gone as planned, and it never would have. In this game where you will spend hours of exciting moments with your friends; You must do your best to break the curse that has already happened. You have to proceed with the right decisions during the gameplay without getting too far from the perception of reality. In this tense game where you need to be at the peak of your concentration at all times, one wrong move can cost you a lot.

FEATURES OFFERED
- Our game, which deals with the themes of religion, takes the players under the influence of different religions and cultures.
- Mystery seeds of a story full of great and deep secrets.
- Fully co-op survival adventure with 1 - 4 players and based on puzzle solving.
- Game design that aims to give the player a full experience of horror.
- With dynamic map structure, puzzles are renewed every time you play.
- Different ways and options.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Misguidead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940M
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Misguidead is a horror-focused co-op game. Players must work together to survive and solve puzzles while investigating mysteries from different religions.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
